page.title: 04Brodsworth Art Exhibition
page.content: Every year{arts and crafts}are exhibited at St Michael's Church, Brodsworth.It is held on Easter Sunday and Monday from 10.00am to 8.00pm. {Artists}come from as far away as Bournemouth.Some of the{artists}come and demonstrate their crafts in the village school.There are gouache,water colours and oil paintings.The prices of the{paintings}range from Â£5.00 to Â£300.00,last year Â£1000 was raised from 15% commission from the artists and the sale of refreshments to be used for church purposes.A great deal of interest is aroused and visitors come from a wide area attracted by the quality of the work.It is one of the few chances local art lovers and collectors have to participate in such an event.A childrens art festival with work from local schools is held in the school at the same time.
